titles.title: Recognizing pitcher Armando Galarraga of the Detroit Tigers for pitching a near-perfect game, declaring that Galarraga pitched a perfect game, and urging Major League Baseball to overturn the mistaken safe call by the umpire that spoiled the perfect game.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
Recognizes Detroit Tigers pitcher Armando Galarraga for pitching a near-perfect game.
Declares that Galarraga pitched a perfect game and urges Major League Baseball to overturn the mistaken safe call by the umpire.
